articles.description: PORTSMOUTH, Va. (WAVY) – Rivers Casino Portsmouth agreed to pay $275,000 in a settlement agreement with the Virginia Lottery for a trio of violations, including underage gambling, licensing requirements related to slot machines and unauthorized games in play.…

articles.title: The Fed Is Set Up for a Pause. Why the Stock Market Is Set for a Fall. - Barron's
